terms.pageDescription: Read our terms of service to understand the rules and guidelines for using our platform.
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to Model Guru. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Model Guru, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.

useLicense.title: Use License
useLicense.content: Permission is granted to temporarily access and use Model Guru for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The materials on Model Guru are provided on an 'as is' basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim all other warranties.

limitations.content: In no event shall Model Guru or its suppliers be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on our website.

revisions.title: Revisions and Errata
revisions.content: The materials appearing on Model Guru could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. We do not warrant that any of the materials are accurate, complete, or current.

links.title: Links
links.content: Model Guru has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: Model Guru may revise these terms of service at any time without notice. By using this website, you agree to be bound by the current version of these terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Model Guru operates.
